::DrillBit::

He closed the box and smiled.
"I love you. And I will take care of them," he wispered.
He walked out to find StarScream. If she ment for him to lead the group,
when she said to take care of them, then he would have to show the
others.
He walked back into the CR room where everyone was.
"Excuse me, I have an announcment."
